website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive paw cleaner is ideal for pet parents on a budget and includes a bonus towel for drying paws after use.
pros: Soft silicone bristles won't hurt your dog's paws
Hanging strap is useful for storage

customer_reviews.title: Soooo worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for a lab mix or any fur baby with swimming paws lol
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best paw cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I've got 3 dogs and they get muddy often! Definitely needed something to help when their paws get constantly muddy. Used it right away and it cleans away the mud. Disregard the dog hair on the pic, one of my fluffiest is shedding. It does the job. Even works on toddlers. 😂
customer_reviews.author: C. Acker

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Paws
customer_reviews.text: I have big dogs who just run through the mud, and it gets all in their paws. This has helped tremendously to clean their paws so they can come inside. You just place water in it and then put the paw in and bring it back out. The soft bristles do not hurt the dogs. A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great paw cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It's always a battle trying to wash the dog's paws when they come back in so this little Gadget really comes in handy. Not only is it easy to fill and wash out, it actually works and gets off the muck that they drag in the the house.
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Luna’s new “toy” has been used a lot specially when we go out for hiking or dog park, is kinda rainy here in Seattle so she always get dirty. This video was taken on the very first time that we tried it on and as you can see she is a little concerned about it, but now every time that she is backing to my car or house after going out she knows already and wait for me to clean her paw. Such a cute dog!!! The product is easy to use you just need put water in it and it comes with a towel that you can use for dry it out. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIA M.

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great thing! I like it very much and it allows me to clean my dog's paws quickly. Works great and is good for my Boxer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a whistle
customer_reviews.text: So this is an interesting contraption. I love that there was no assembly & that it came with a bonus cloth to dry my puppy's paws. It was easy to use, we just filled it with a bit of soapy water, tilted it to the side, allowed the small silicone fingers to both massage his paws & lift away any debris, & we were done. The only improvement we would suggest to the manufacturer is to make a size smaller for our stout little nugget.
customer_reviews.author: Co-winky dink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the active Dog
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this at first but I have already used it a dozen times and it makes quick work of cleaning paws. I fill it about half way with water, insert the dogs paw and "scrub". We are done in about a minute and the cleaner came with a perfect sized chamois to dry off her paws. We are lucky that our dog is well trained and tolerant as I can see this being challenging for those who have dogs that won't stay put. It worked so well I got one for a neighbor with a golden as a thank you for always watching our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: i really wanted this product to work
customer_reviews.text: I have a large silver lab, and a very muddy back yard. Cleaning his paws can be very frustrating as he hates it and we have a very light colored carpet in our home. I really hoped this product would make the whole process easier but it didn't. His paw barely fit into the container, and it spilled easily. He looked super uncomfortable during it all so I just stopped using it. I think it may worked on dog that aren't so big!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought the high top model which shows a picture of a large golden retriever but I received a size medium which says it is for bulldogs, corgis and the like. I have a 73 pound Siberian husky mix. I put his paw inside the cup and he immediately jerks it out, spilling the water everywhere. We tried it a couple more times and he was a little better but it still did not really get the dirt off his feet as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: LJ777

customer_reviews.title: Not puppy friendly - water spills & difficult getting paw in
customer_reviews.text: It’s an interesting concept and I was drawn to trying it out after reading the other reviews. My new pup gets messy daily, and the paw wipes are expensive given how many I’ve gone through. That being said, it wasn’t exactly easy to get her to stick her paw in this without water falling all over the place for the first time. After a few uses, she got a bit more used to it, but it just was more trouble than it was worth. I’m going to go back to using puppy wipes instead because they are half the hassle and all of the benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Buys Alot

customer_reviews.title: Juries out at this time...so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Asking for a review one day after delivery is risky. No idea how the device will hold up long term, did work well the 3 times I have used it. The threads on the screw on top are very shallow, I foresee that as a potential problem. The construction of the device itself appears to be of quality. I purchased the Large, my dog’s paws are 2.25 inches wide so it has enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have a 70lbs Pitbull\Labrador mix. I noticed she was licking her paws excessively to the point where they started turning a brownish/yellowish (rusty) color. Her vet advised me to wash her paws after walks or playing in the yard. I am so happy this product exists, my doesn’t have muddy paw prints and my fur baby isn’t licking anymore. This product is worth the money. Avoid bacteria from forming on you fur baby’s paws this easy to use paw cleaner. I love that a towel was included:)
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This paw cleaner is a life saver for me and our doberman. She always runs under the deck where it gets a bit muddy. This cleaner is super easy to use as all you really need to do is wet her paws and then insert them into the cleaner over and over again. Adding water helps. Once you are done with one paw, or all paws a quick rinse of the cleaner does the trick to clean it up. The rubber bristles are effective too. A good cost effective buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nick O

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give to my mother, she has a medium size poodle and every time she walks with him she had the work to hold him on the sink to wash his paws, so I thought this would be perfect. When it arrived I thought a little too big for him, even being a medium size dog, he couldn’t insert all the paw on the cup, but even like that is so much easily to wash with this even without being able to insert all the paw. It cleans pretty well and he doesn’t looks uncomfortable with. My mother loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: My carpets are finally clean and the dog can happily play outside without being yelled at everytime he comes back in. This dog paw cleaner is so easy to use. The soft bristles gently loosen dirt of my pups paws as the water washes it away. I love the cloth that accompanied the dog paw cleaner, it’s the perfect size to dry his pads and send him on his way. This dog paw cleaner is portable so you can take it any where. It comes apart easily and is a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Great for seasonal allergies-paw rinse
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets really bad seasonal allergies so this is a great way to help! Prior to this I was purchasing baby wipes and wiping his paws but that didn’t seem to clean them completely/price adds up. This is an easy way to clean or rinse your dogs paws-it seems he hasn’t been chewing at his paws as much since I have began using this. He wasn’t crazy at first about it but he is very laid back so he doesn’t fight me!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ewald

customer_reviews.title: Friendly-used
customer_reviews.text: My dog’s color is short-legged beige/white shihtu. Every time I walk him, his feet looks extra-dirtier than ever. Hes always been used to wipes after our walks but because of corona I had to take the cleanliness to the next level. Either wipe him or bathe completely bathe in the tub. With this product, not only I can spend more time with my dog, but also saving money and time to groom with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dentalsticks123

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to clean the paw after walk outside!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hardwood floor that's cleaned every day and I walk with bare foot on it. So I would clean my dog's paw and leg after walk outside every day. Though it's just another "little trouble" of keeping a dog, it does make me tired sometimes. But this tool really makes this so easy and saves me a lot of messiness. It comes with a piece of thick cloth to dry the paw after wash. I put some soap into the water so it works pretty well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's a fight, but it works
customer_reviews.text: My dog would give this a one-star rating- he does not like it at all. But when I've managed to wrangle him into using it, I've been impressed with how well it has worked. It even works on the little dried mud balls that he somehow gets shoved up in between his foot pads. Overall, I would definitely recommend it (and hopefully he gets over it and it gets easier to use).
customer_reviews.author: ALLFLUKSD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large to fit my dogs paws (rottweilers, heeled, lab) . The roots cant use it and they are the reason I ordered it. It is easy enough to use, but defeats the purpose when you have to change the water for each paw. The large size was only big enough for my heeler. Save your money, use a large bowl wash rag and towel.
customer_reviews.author: Jennine Mustard

customer_reviews.title: What you didn’t know you needed
customer_reviews.text: Please buy this not only for your pup but also for the environment. I’m so happy I found this so I don’t have to use paw wipes anymore. Not spend a lot of money on them monthly. My dog also loves this. Clean paws are happy paws. It’s super easy to use you just stick their paws in and they come out nice and clean. It’s also super easy to carry around with you if you go out for a run or you need to pack it up. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dav

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this product but it really works! It really gets the mud off my 3 dogs. The silicone nubs are soft and don't irritate the dogs. I need to dump the water after each dog but it's a quick process so no big deal. Everything comes apart easily to give it a good cleaning and is simple to reassemble. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: nerbear

customer_reviews.title: Must HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ! I saw this on a friends Instagram page she had posted. I was curious and very skeptic at first.. but this is a great product. It took my dog a few times until he did not mind this but now he doesn't mind it at all! It has saved us money on wipes and all the dirt that comes out of their paws,, I was shocked ! highly suggest getting this product !
customer_reviews.author: Sivia

customer_reviews.title: Muddy walks - no longer a problem
customer_reviews.text: Mud, mud, mud. That’s what the past few weeks have been like. And our dog loves puddles. Towels were not doing the job and we don’t have easy access to a hose near our doors to wash him each time he goes out. This thing does a great job. Large size is just barely big enough for our 110-lb Newfie/German Shepherd mix, but his paws fit If I am careful.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This product works! I was skeptical, but figured it wouldn't hurt to give it a try. My backyard becomes very swampy and wet during certain seasons or if it rains, and my dog's paws are filthy, as a direct result. This product is so easy to use, and it is more effective than I could have even imagined. I am so happy I decided to give it a try, and would recommend to anyone who struggles with dirty paws!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Works ok if paws aren’t too dirty
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this when my pup finished outside in the back yard. The grass was wet and his paws were pretty dirty. I got the first paw cleaned, and after that the water was dirty. So I guess it was 25 percent effective on my dogs dirty paws.
customer_reviews.author: pattijul

customer_reviews.title: Really big
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be great for my pup. Dirty paws aren’t fun. There’s no way she could get her paws inside safely. The reviews made it sound like it was smaller and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela C

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: GAME CHANGER! Bu this if you have a dog that likes to dog. I’m going buy one for each of my dog owning friends - it works that well! Fill the cup with some water, put ur dogs paw in and scrub it on the bristles then dry it with the towel. I won’t need a bag if paw wipes every week anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Waleed

customer_reviews.title: great way to keep dogs paws clean!
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few weeks ago and have been using it with my dog on rainy days. He loves going on poodles and is hard to keep her paws clean. At first she didn't like it but now she got used to it and she rans happy around the house when her paws are clean. Also this product helps her paw allergies so she doesn't lick them that much! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: claufalconi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We have a small dog. Too much of an effort with his small paws which did not get clean with the device. We got rid of it after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: skierjoe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use dog paw cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use paw cleaner! Just add water and let the gentle silicone bristles do the rest. It’s amazing what comes off in this cleaner. This is great for cleaning our dogs paws after a walk or hike in the rain or snow. It includes a soft towel for drying off after washing. My floors thank you!
customer_reviews.author: itsamre81

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great product
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this product way more than I expected. Our yard has a lot of dirt and mud and I was tired of wiping my dogs paws with a towel. This product saves me so much time. It is very easy to use. It is also very easy to clean, the dirt and mud rinse right out.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Paw cleaner for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: I think this paw cleaner works best for larger dogs. It is much too tall for my 9 pound chihuahua with slender legs. The height of this paw cleaner takes up almost 80% of her leg. However, I think the concept is good but can be designed for better fit for smaller dogs with slender legs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work but my dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: This looks and sounds like a good idea, and it generally seem to work, but... If your dog is like my 5-month old goldendoodle and has no patience or desire to be constrained, she/he may not sit still long enough for you to use this. I would recommend this for only the most cooperative or docile dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: good for your pet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for my dogs. they go out 3 times a day, it makes their feet get dirty, but this one help me easy to clean up their feet, you only have to pull in some water. it won't hurt you pet, and it's ease to use. also it come with a towel. so it's easy to bring it with travel too.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We live on a lake and our Goldendoodle loves being in the water. By the time she gets out of the lake and up to the house her paws are dirty and muddy. The paw washer makes clean up easy and Izzy loves the attention she gets as we use it. This is our second purchase: one for the front and one for the lakeside of the house.
customer_reviews.author: S Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My puppy hates his paws being touched, so cleaning him off after muddy walks has always proved difficult to say the least. This thing helped so much with all of that. The day it came in, it had rained the night before so I was able to try it out. I havent tried the top brush yet but I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth k

customer_reviews.title: Must have for an active pet..
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this much earlier, very useful product. My pet loves to run in the yard and get his paws all covers in mud, inside the nails and the webbed paws. This product helps to clean it all up and also acts like a massager ... he likes it...
customer_reviews.author: PBR

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: This size is just right for my golden retriever dog. Before that, when I took it out for a walk, there would always be some mud on its paws. It was inconvenient to wash it with a towel when I went home, and it would not be particularly clean, which was very time-consuming. . This cup is really convenient, and it is cleaned very clean, and the paws are not let go. At first, the dog was a bit unacceptable, but after using it a few times, it can be said to be a love. With this cup, the home hygiene index will rise even more
customer_reviews.author: Martha Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: My pug likes this cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my 3 years old dog. He is medium size pug. I usually swipe put his foot after walking. Since I bought this one I use this paw cleaner everytime. My dog likes this and I am satisfied this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Min

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my backyard was unfinished and it was clay mud but now I have concrete. Now I use it in the shower to wash her paws. It works great! She doesn’t mind it at all. I use the top part that comes off to scrub her body with shampoo. Nice little bonus
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great to clean paws.
customer_reviews.text: My dog stays out all day and we were using an old towel to clean her feet before she came in for the evening until I found this. I love it and so does she. She actually holds her paws up to be washed now before she comes in. It took a couple of washes before she knew what was going on but since we've been using this, feet cleaning goes a whole lot faster and easier. It's one of my better finds.
customer_reviews.author: rrphillips

customer_reviews.title: It’s so quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with warm water. I even dipped them in with their dirtiest claws. They came out much cleaner. They are wet, so I have to dry them with a towel. But it eliminates many claws that struggle into corners and cracks. I was very impressed. It’s so quick and easy to use. Also very easy to clean since it’s silicone! Pour out the water and you will know that it can clean their claws. In general, I am very satisfied with this purchase. So far, this is the best way to solve the problem of mud claw.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: My dog is trying to dig out a pool for the backyard and I have been having to give her a couple of baths a week when she comes to the door with mud everywhere. She isn't small either, she is a very large Irish Setter who normally hates me cleaning her up but she loved this paw cleaner. I think the little fingers inside the cup felt good on her paws and legs. This has really been a life saver. Jenifer and I both say thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dnetra Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My pup didn’t like it at first but now waits by the door for me to clean his paws 🐾! Before getting this I wasted countless wet wipes cleaning his paws after his walks. Also extremely easy to clean! :)
customer_reviews.author: Gil Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Paw Saviour!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I looooove it!!! Truly does clean my puppies paw after a fun after noon in the park. I have to bath her just little bit of doggy sope, water, and couple of in and out dips and she has her pretty white paw back. Love the towel as is very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Needs a lid
customer_reviews.text: It needs to have a water-tight lid. Then it would truly be portable. For someone who lives in the Pacific Northwest with a lot of mud, it would really be nice to be able to fill it with water and take it with me in my car. That way after she gets her feet muddy if I let her out to play or relieve herself, I could wash her feet before she gets back in the car without having to remember to carry another water source to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Ouzts

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product! I have a Great Dane and a Beagle at home. I haven't tried it on the dane yet but it worked great on our beagle (who gets the dirtiest anyways). The towel is a must as her paws were soaking after I took them out of the container - but they were clean and it was a quick and easy process! She didn't seem to mind having her paws in there either. I don't think that this one is big enough for the Dane's paws but I mostly wanted it for the beagle anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The component materials seem pretty sturdy. I haven't had any issues with it cracking or breaking
customer_reviews.text: I never knew such a thing existed and it’s made cleaning my dogs’ paws soooo much easier. My 90 lb dogs have huge paws and when they’re muddy, they’re very dirty. Just fill with water, stick their paw in, move and twist it around, and you easily get a clean paw. It’s quick and efficient! My dogs weren’t scared of it either and were quite curious and willing to stick their paw in. So glad I came across this and bought it for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Joao Pedro Viegas Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to have in my bag or car! I enjoy bringing my puppy out to the park or on walks. After a couple hours of running around on dirt and soil his paws are stained brown from all the mud. I usually put a few pumps of his shampoo into the container and toss it in my bag until it is ready to use. Easy to take apart and clean.
customer_reviews.author: David Li

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, dogs didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Great concept! But my dogs were definitely scared of it. They had no issue with putting their paws inside but once you move either the product or their paws up and down to clean them, it scared them and they refused to use it. Maybe the feeling of the rubber moving on their paws freaken them out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Fits large paws
customer_reviews.text: My biggest worry was that it didn't look wide enough for my shepherd/malumute mix. Buy it is wide enough for his paws and the bristles are long enough that it easily cleans my labs paws too. We currently don't have grass in our PNW yard so they come in extra muddy sometimes and this is great at keeping the floors clean and its easy to rinse after.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: they don't hate it! Bigger than we expected but works well for our medium sized dogs. They don't mind using this AND it get's their feet MUCH cleaner than wiping alone
customer_reviews.author: Prakash

customer_reviews.title: My very picky dog actually doesn't mind this and it keeps my carpet and couch a lot cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the dog doesn't hate it, and cleans the paws well. What else could you ask for? My dog is afraid of everything but actually tolerates and maybe even seems to enjoy this! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JS4451

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog doesn't mind this!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my dog would hate this...but she actually did not mind that I put one of her paws in this. I think it actually gave her a little massage. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Races

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This is perfect for keeping your carpet clean. Super easy to use, has soft silicone insert to help remove dirt from inside the paws that can be taken out and washed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product to keep my puppy feet clean
customer_reviews.text: We just got a new puppy a week ago and I was wondering how to keep his feet clean after we take him outside for his pee-n-poo time. This product really helps in keeping his feet clean. I'm really happy and satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: You have a dog? You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: This is LIFE changing! Before I got this product I would always clean my dog's paws with a wet cloth, but dirt would still come in the house. I tried doing my version of a paw tubby, by using a mason jar BUT it wouldn't clean his paw and I would end up cleaning up a bigger mess. So with this it's so easy, there is no mess and my dog does not mind it at all. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karoline Pereira

customer_reviews.title: The paw cleaner is easy to rinse out and is ready for the next use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use. My dog used to hate getting his feet washed and I would have to wrestle him to get him to put his feet in the bowl of water. Their fur is white so it shows dirt very quickly! I wanted to get something to help clean off their paws so they wouldn't look as dirty and to prevent leg mats from forming. Now, he stands and I am done in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Plus the towel is amazingly absorbent and you can ring it out and reuse it over and over. I dry 4 dogs feet at a time and then rinse it and ring it out and it’s good to go a few hours later to do it again. Fast drying and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to clean the mud off of the pups paws. The only difficult part is if she lays down it tends to spill. You have to keep them standing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Olten

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves to dig and always comes in with dirty paws. I used to have to wash her paws in the tub. Now I can give them a quick wash with this paw cleaner. Gentle on her paws and easy to clean. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, my dog love to go outside and play in the backyard and come back with mud and sands in her paws. This tool help to remove all the dirt in her paw cracks easily. Also it is a easy to clean up. Just unscrew the top lid and remove the silicone pad and rinse with soap and water. It even comes with a microfiber rug to help clean her paws. Very user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: jovan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this when its snowing out side. My dog gets chunks of snow stuck on his fur. I put warm water to help melt the snow off.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Hey!  Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs don’t even mind! The soft bristles don’t hurt them at all, but do loosen And remove the mud. Disassembled completely for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Woman

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little getting used to, but definitely cleans better than just a towel, especially on caked on muddy paws!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: A LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! My puppy loves to run around and play, but always gets her paws so dirty! This is a great tool for me to use before she comes into the house. It's very quick and after only a few scrubs her paws are perfectly clean! Would definitely recommend this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Soft bristles and cleans my dogs paws!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest solution to clean up my dog’s muddy paws. As soon as I got it in the mail I immediately used it to clean his paws and it works so well! The bristles are soft and gentle and it gets the job done. No more using paper towels to clean his paws!
customer_reviews.author: M.Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. Works well for my large lab. Had a lot of rain recently and therefore a lot of mud. This helped my floors tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Kim_Alex

customer_reviews.title: Clean paws equal clean floors
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tool to use on my pup’s paws after an outdoor shower for her via garden hose or after hikes or muddy walks in the rain. It actually cleans the dirt from my dog’s paws. She doesn’t mind it either! Clean paws equal clean floors!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Review of anipaw paw cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good paw cleaner for my fur babies and this one hits the spot. After having a long walk outside it is easy to clean my dog's paws using this. And add to that they have a towel included! :)
customer_reviews.author: Buchoy B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works very very well. However for big paws it is difficult to fit paws in with water slowing out. Have a towel ready.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lynn Trehar

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This was truly a worthless piece of equipment. Don’t waste your money. Just wipe your pets paws with a towel. Duh.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good. I wish my dog was used to using it though. It will take some time. Nice product tho.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of rain and orange clay soil. The constant paw prints in my house was driving me crazy. Then my dog started developing a yeast infection between her toes. I bought this, wipe her paws dry, and spray some chlorohexidine spray on her feet. Her yeast infection is cleared up, and I no longer have to mop multiple times every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great paws cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and ordered one from another vendor and due to Covid, it arrived when I ordered it from amazon. Amazon rocks!!
customer_reviews.author: delo4sho

customer_reviews.title: No more bowls ...
customer_reviews.text: No more bowls, buckets, pans of water to stick paws in while trying not to spill. This is so easy and my Lab/Boxer doesn’t hesitate a bit to slip paws in and easily remove dirt and mud. Especially great when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for middle size dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a shepherd dog. This paw cleaner is the right size for his paws and the towel is very soft. My dog doesn't like a shower, but he enjoys cleaning his paws. I'm wondering if he can learn how to clean his own paws before bed every day.
customer_reviews.author: Redamancyfox

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for those muddy garden stomps my puppy loves to do. The towel is super soft and absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey spychalski

customer_reviews.title: Easy paw cleaner, works great
customer_reviews.text: It makes easier to clean the paws for my two schnauzers. It’s easy to use and works great. It’s also easy to clean itself once used. I would get this for all my friends who has to wash the feet for their canines everytime after the walk.
customer_reviews.author: YW Lim

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Literally just a cheap plastic cup with a silicone bristle inside. Worth maybe 5 bucks at most.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bristles work amazingly well! Very soft rubber was able to brush of dirty and hair off their paw
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is small and great for cleaning your fur baby's paws! I use this everyday after I take my dog for a walk. Easy to use and affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Minsu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Wish bought this earlier
customer_reviews.text: I used to use old feeding bowl to wash my dog’s paws which wastes lots of water and not easy to wash since my dog is super energetic. This cleaner is easy to use and my dog stay very well during washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jieai Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not as easy to turn on dogs foot as I have a large dog with large paws but works really just with dipping motion. Have used with red clay mud. So much better than just a towel!
customer_reviews.author: J.Viskochil

customer_reviews.title: Dog paws become very clean
customer_reviews.text: The artifact to solve my dog's mud claws is finally here! My dog ​​is very crazy, as long as he goes out, he will be very excited! Run everywhere, enjoy joy everywhere. Of course it will not take the initiative to harm others, it is just pure and lively. This cup is particularly easy to use, and it also solves the problem of my family hygiene!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Haven

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I highly recommend it. Made my life easier. Less of a mess.
customer_reviews.author: leana

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and useful
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My doodle actually enjoys me cleaning his huge paws with this.
customer_reviews.author: zach62

customer_reviews.title: Paw-fect
customer_reviews.text: Dogs not the biggest fan at first but works well at removing dirt/sand. Make sure to have a towel handy, obviously.. but makes paw clean up a ton easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Love the little towel it holds alot of water. I have a med. Size yorkie. She has allergies and I use it when she is biting at her feet and at the end of the day .
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to keep your floor clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a must If you have a dog, mud in your backyard and wood or tile flooring. I No long have to clean the floor everything he comes in. Easy use and gets all the crevices of the paw.
customer_reviews.author: Badalbert

customer_reviews.title: Works great - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Locc Ccc e it! Easy to use and keeps the mud in the cop - not my house!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: We liked it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t fill it all the way up, only half fillet so there’s room for the paw. Our dogs constantly are running in dirt and clay and it got most of it off. The towel is only good for wiping off one dogs feet. But the product itself works very well
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea! Works like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Have one in the garage and one in the car. Works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets muddy paws whenever it rains. We used to wipe her feet with baby wipes, but this is a lot easier & it cleans up great. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Golden Retriever
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. My golden retriever loves to sink in the mud and this truly cleans all the mud and gunk from his feet. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, tried it once and threw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get my dogs feet into the cleaner. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BAHunt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, fast shipping! Have not used it yet but my dogs paws fits inside tho
customer_reviews.author: Miranda berry

customer_reviews.title: For all dogs to have if you want there feet and your carpet to stay cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and even my maltese Winston doesn't mind the feeling of the bristles threw his paws.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Reyes

product_meta.title: Dog Paw Cleaner, Anipaw 2-in-1 Silicone Dog Paw Washer Cup with Towel, Portable Pet Cleaning Brush Feet Cleaner for Dog Cat Grooming with Muddy Paws
feature_bullets: 【SAFE CHOICE FOR PETS】The portable dog paw cleaner is carefully selected environmentally friendly silicone material features better softness than plastic one, without harming your beloved dogs. It gently and effectively save your pet's dirty and muddy paws, keep you pets clean and healthy.

【HUMANIZATION DESIGN】It’s an innovative combination of dog paw washer and dog cleaning brush, you can clean your dog's paw, but also can removes the silicone lid separately to give your dog a gentle massage and bathing etc. Upgraded wear-resistant frosted bottle that enhanced friction and more comfortable to grip.

【A MUST-HAVE FOR PET】Cylindrical design allows you to effectively wash hard-to-reach areas. The mouth of the dog foot cleaner measures 5.9" and and Top Dia 3.85", suitable for all size pets. Ideal for home use or outdoors to get your pet's paws clean before touching the furniture or carpet.

【EASY TO USE】Add water to the dog plunger, insert the muddy paw, spin the container to engage the bristles, then remove dogs paw and dry it. Special split design, easy to remove and clean. You can get a soft towel to dry your pet’s feet and body, prevent your pet from catching cold or walking on floor and blankets with wet feet.

【WORRY FREE AFTER-SALE】The pet foot washer is a perfect gift for pet lovers. It bound to impress for as housewarming gift, birthday gift, Thanksgiving gift, Christmas gift ect. If for any reason you are unhappy with the purchase, just let us know and we’ll be happy to give you a full refund - no hassles, no delays.
